COMMENT_TX: $when C.C. Sabathia did not get over to cover first, Mark Teixeira had to dive to the bag to make the putout; Orlando Hudson ran to third when he saw Teixeira down on the ground
$Yankees RF Greg Golson claimed he caught the sinking liner but the play was ruled a trap by RF umpire Chris Guccione; the umpires huddled but let the call stand

ej,gardr001,M,wendh902,Balls and strikes $the Twins thought they had struck out Lance Berkman on the 1-2 pitch that was called a ball by HP umpire Hunter Wendelstedt; Berkman doubled on the next pitch; Twins Manager Ron Gardenhire went to the mound and stayed long enough that Wendelstedt came to the mound to break up the meeting; as Gardenhire left the mound he started arguing with Wendelstedt, who ejected Gardenhire; it was the second manager ejection of the day, which had never happened before in post- season history; Joe Maddon had been ejected earlier in the afternoon
$when C.C. Sabathia did not get over to cover first, Mark Teixeira had to dive to the bag to make the putout; Orlando Hudson ran to third when he saw Teixeira down on the ground
$Yankees RF Greg Golson claimed he caught the sinking liner but the play was ruled a trap by RF umpire Chris Guccione; the umpires huddled but let the call stand

ej,gardr001,M,wendh902,Balls and strikes $the Twins thought they had struck out Lance Berkman on the 1-2 pitch that was called a ball by HP umpire Hunter Wendelstedt; Berkman doubled on the next pitch; Twins Manager Ron Gardenhire went to the mound and stayed long enough that Wendelstedt came to the mound to break up the meeting; as Gardenhire left the mound he started arguing with Wendelstedt, who ejected Gardenhire; it was the second manager ejection of the day, which had never happened before in post- season history; Joe Maddon had been ejected earlier in the afternoon
